name: University High School of Science and Engineering
lead: Early college high school located on the campus of University of Hartford

pillars.name: Unparalleled Education
pillars.description: Students are presented with a wide variety of high level courses throughout their four years.

pillars.name: College Collaboration
pillars.description: A partnership with UHart allows our students to get a full taste of the college world.

pillars.name: Extracurricular Excellence
pillars.description: From popcorn club to robotics to track and field, there is something for everyone!

announcements: Mohegan Sun Bus Trip  Friday, November 1st  Help support the UHSSE International Travel Club!      •                    $45 per person.  Each passenger will receive a $15 food credit (or use it at the Season’s Buffet for a free dinner) and a $15 bet voucher.  •                    2 bus pick-ups/drop offs.  4:15 pm UHSSE                   5:15pm ­Glastonbury ­commuter lot at Routes 2 & 3, Main St. (Exit 5)  •                    We will stay at Mohegan Sun for 5 hours.  •                    Please email Jenn Todisco at todij001@hartfordschools.org or call 860­695-9020 if you are interested in buying tickets. Once tickets have been bought there will be no refunds.  •                    This event is for 21 years old and over. You can bring food/drinks on the bus. We will also be hosting a 50/50 drawing on the ride down to the casino, why not let the winning begin early :)     Thanks for your support!
